name: Syber
description:
"If you wanna join this crew kid your gonna have to prove yourself! Gimmie 5 laps of the alien sector and dont kill anything! not a thing. do that and your in!"

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Credit goes out to freesound.org and its contributors for the free music and sound effects which I edited for the game. Many Thanks! Everything else was done by ourselves in our small inexperienced 3 man team and has been stressful but fun and enlightening. Thanks to the devs at D11 for the assistance with the build and glad to be a part of it all. Thanks Guys! - Smudge6945 "Alan Smith"
